initial_state: User is logged in and has administrator rights. User is on the dashboard view or has the sidebar visible.
steps: Locate the '+Add project' button either at the bottom of the sidebar or at the top-right corner of the dashboard.
Enter the desired project name in the prompt that appears.
Confirm the creation of the project.
expected_state: A new project is created and visible on the dashboard view as a project card. User can access and manage this project.
